title: Police identify victims of Sunday's double homicide
content:
KANSAS CITY, Mo. —
Police have released the names of two men who died after a shooting at a family party early Sunday that also injured three others.
Antonio Hernandez, 31, and Omero Garcia, 39, were killed in the shooting just after midnight Sunday near Thompson and Colorado avenues.
Three other people were injured in the shooting.
Investigators have not announced any arrests. Anyone with information is asked to call the Crime Stoppers TIPS Hotline at 816-474-8477.
